page.title: 08CONTRASTING LIVES OF TWO MEN
page.content:
I AM A CARPENTER BY TRADE AND I WORK IN LONDON. ON A TYPICAL DAY I CATCH THE 5:52 am TRAIN TO WORK.I START WORK AT 8:00am AND HAVE A LUNCH BREAK AT 1:00pm.I FINISH WORK AT 6:00pm AND CATCH THE 5:20pm TRAIN HOME.I GET HOME AT 7:20pm AND GO TO BED AT 9:00pm.
I AM UNEMPLOYED.GENERALLY ALL DAYS ARE THE SAME.I GET UP AT 7:30am AND I HAVE MY BREAKFAST AT 7:45.IN THE MORNING I TAKE MY TWO CHILDREN TO SCHOOL AND DO THE ODD BIT OF GARDENING. I HAVE MY LUNCH AT NOON AND IN THE AFTERNOON I DO SOME DECORATING OR OTHER HOUSEHOLD JOBS.I HAVE MY DINNER AT 6:00pm AND I HARDLY EVER GO OUT TO EAT AND I DO NOT USUALLY TAKE PART IN ANY PHYSICAL ACTIVITIES.
